info.title: Graasp Backend API
info.description: Graasp Backend API used to serve data to frontend applications

def-2.description: Pair of tokens used for authentication in mobile
def-2.title: Tokens Pair

def-10.description: Message from a member in a chat of an item.
def-10.title: Chat Message

def-11.description: Chat object of an item with its messages.
def-11.title: Chat

def-45.description: Like object of an item when a member likes it.
def-45.title: Item Like

def-46.description: Like object of an item when a member likes it. Item property is a packed item
def-46.title: Packed Item Like

post.summary: Log in with email and password
post.description: Log in with email and password. The user must provide a valid email, password, and captcha. The captcha is used to prevent brute force attacks.

post.summary: Set a password for the authenticated member
post.description: Set a password for the authenticated member. This is only possible if the member does not have a password set already.

patch.summary: Update the password of the authenticated member
patch.description: Update the password of the authenticated member. The user must provide the current password and the new password.

post.description: Create a reset password request. This will send an email to the member in his language with a link to reset the password. The link will be valid for a limited time.

patch.description: Confirm the reset password request. This will change the password of the member associated with the reset password request.

get.summary: Get the current password status of the authenticated member
get.description: Return whether the authenticated member has a password defined.

post.description: Register with email and name, protected by a captcha and challenge. The captcha and challenge are used to prevent brute force attacks.
Login with email, protected by a captcha and challenge. The captcha and challenge are used to prevent brute force attacks.
Login with email and password, protected by a captcha and challenge. The captcha and challenge are used to prevent brute force attacks.
Authenticate to obtain session cookie given provided token and verifier

get.summary: Authentication on the web with mobile token
get.description: Obtain session cookie to authenticate on the web given provided mobile JWT token. Redirect to given url.

post.summary: Create an item membership for the logged in user if there is an Item Login
post.description:
Create an item membership on the item with the given ID for the logged in user. 
    The item needs to be associated with an Item Login.

get.description: Get likes for current member. Item property is a packed item.
Get chat object for given item.

post.description: Save message in chat for given item.

delete.description: Clear messages of chat for given item.

patch.description: Edit message in chat for given item.

delete.description: Delete message in chat for given item.

get.summary: Get all membership requests for an item
get.description: Get all membership requests with member information for an item by its ID

post.description:
Create a membership request for an item with the authenticated member. 
  The member should not have any permission on the item.
  If there is an Item Login associated with the item, the request will be rejected.

get.summary: Get the status of the membership request for the authenticated member
get.description: Get the status of the membership request for the authenticated member for an item by its ID

delete.description: Delete a membership request from a member id and an item id.
